name: Next.js Middleware A/B テスト (概念)
description: Cookie ベースの A/B 分岐の概念

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(req: Request){ const url = new URL(req.url); const c = (req as any).headers.get('cookie')||''; const group = c.includes('ab=1') ? 'B' : 'A'; if(url.pathname==='/' && group==='B') return NextResponse.rewrite(new URL('/exp', url)); return NextResponse.next(); }
